attributes.action: Remove child tax credit from CSA income calculation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am happy to pay child maintainance for my child and am aggreived by non paying non resident parents. However an award for CTC should not be included as income in the NRP calculation as this is for the children that live with them and the PWC get's CTC for the child who lives with them. I urge the government to stop penalising children and make the system fair by removing CTC from the calculation.
